commit.message:
Merge #2526

2526: Support LSP 3.15 r=matklad a=kjeremy

This merely upgrades our protocol support. It does not add any of the new features.

Co-authored-by: Jeremy Kolb <kjeremy@gmail.com>

Merge #2526

2526: Support LSP 3.15 r=matklad a=kjeremy

This merely upgrades our protocol support. It does not add any of the new features.

Co-authored-by: Jeremy Kolb <kjeremy@gmail.com>
